name: E20R Enhanced Member Directory and Profile Pages for Paid Memberships Pro
author: eighty20results

sections.description:
Member Directory and Profile pages plugin for Paid Memberships Pro. The plugin supports filtered custom search fields for user meta data, preconfigured and separate billing and shipping sections, link to user's own editable profile if logged in, public/private fields, etc, member only access to user profile page(s), etc

.
